message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with a communication system involving encoding and decoding of information, which falls under the Information Theory (cs.IT) sub-category. The use of Markov sources and noisy channels suggests a possible connection to Multimedia (cs.MM) and Signal Processing (cs.SI) sub-categories. The mention of sufficient statistics and time-invariant random variables points towards a potential link to Data Structures (cs.DS) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories.
